## ğŸ”„ Type of change
<!-------------- INSTRUCTIONS --------------
Mark all checkboxes that apply with an `x`
(e.g. `[ ]` becomes `[x]`)
------------------------------------------->
- [ ] ğŸ“š Documentation, examples, tutorials, dependencies update
- [ ] ğŸ› Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ğŸ¥‚ Improvement (non-breaking change which improves an existing feature)
- [ ] âœ¨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] ğŸ’¥ Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] ğŸ” Security fix
- [ ] ğŸ” Other (Please describe)

## âœ… Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have updated documentation (e.g. README.md, comments in code)
- [ ] I have reviewed my code changes
- [ ] I have tested my code changes and added necessary tests
